DataElement.preferredName: External Healthcare Facility Clinical Study Data Element Collection Submission Agreement Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine whether or not an outside organization where healthcare services are provided has agreed to gather and submit data elements associated with a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: External Healthcare Facility Clinical Study Data Element Collection Submission Agreement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface._The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided._A data element associated with a clinical study._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.:The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided.

Concepts.definition: Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.
The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided.

Property.preferredName: Clinical Study Data Element Collection Submission Agreement
Property.preferredDefinition: A data element associated with a clinical study.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

Concepts.definition: A data element associated with a clinical study.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
